comment._content: Again the map shows Congo rather than Mandala in Malawi

comment.author: 59368687@N07
comment._content: This building is still standing on Mandala Road in Blantyre Malawi

comment.author: 59356674@N05
comment._content: I think that house is still standing. I saw a photo of it a while ago, but I can't remember where. Is it the office for the Malawi Society, I wonder?

comment.author: 59356674@N05
comment._content: I didn't notice your comment, Clive. So I didn't imagine it.

comment.author: 59419369@N05
comment._content: It is the oldest building in Malawi (1882) and is the current home for La Caverna Art Gallery and the library of the Society of Malawi
